flawed_nl_solution:
Mary started with 5 books and returned 3 so she had 5-3 = <<5-3=6>>6 books
She had 6 books and checked out 5 more books so she had 6+5 = <<6+5=11>>11 books
She now has 11 books but returned 2 so she has 11-2 = <<11-2=9>>9 books
She had 9 books and checked out 7 more books so she has 9+7 = <<9+7=16>>16 books checked out
#### 16

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2, not 6. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
